name: Medieval Monster Match
description:
Build your village to defend it against the hordes of monsters that are coming for you. Develop your villagers and collect as much gold as possible while matching your way through this medieval Match-3 game.

Features:

  • Match tiles on the board to collect valuable resources, fight evil monsters and earn lots of gold
  • Build your village to make progress
  • Develop archers and knights to defend your village more effectively

This game is currently in development.
